## addRowToRow() function

Returns a new matrix whose row at `targetRow` has had the row at `rowToAdd` added to it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function addRowToRow<S>(matrix: Matrix<S>, targetRow: number, rowToAdd: number): Matrix<S>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | <code>Matrix&lt;S&gt;</code> | The original matrix |
|  targetRow | <code>number</code> | The index of the row to modify |
|  rowToAdd | <code>number</code> | The index of the row to add |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix<S>`

The matrix with the transformation applied
